T02D2932:339a-1: badzra bi d'a ra na na ma dh'a ra ni ratna dhyu ti mandal bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D2932:339a-3: rdo rje rnam par 'joms ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
T02D2932:339a-4: kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rin chen snang ba
T02D2932:339a-5: zhes bya ba / bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2932:339a-6: ma rig log par lta ba 'joms mdzad pa'i //
T02D2932:339a-7: ye shes thugs rje nyi ma lta bu yis //
T02D2932:339a-8: mi shes sgrib pa ma lus sel mdzad pa'i //
T02D2932:339a-9: rdo rje rnam par 'joms la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D2932:339a-10: gti mug dra ba bsal ba dang //
T02D2932:339a-11: 'dod chags dri ma bkru ba dang //
T02D2932:339a-12: zhe sdang zhi bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2932:339a-13: rgyud la brten nas 'di bshad do //
T02D2932:339a-14: byams dang snying rjer ldan pa yis //
T02D2932:339a-15: theg chen don la rab tu zhugs //
T02D2932:339a-16: sngon du bsnyen pa rab rdzogs shing //
T02D2932:339a-17: brtul zhugs can gyis rab tu brtsam //
T02D2932:339a-18: dad dang ldan zhing snying brtser bcas //
T02D2932:339a-19: ri bo nags tshal yid 'ong ba'i //
T02D2932:339a-20: dben pa'i gnas su yongs su 'dug ste //
T02D2932:339a-21: sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ni //
T02D2932:339a-22: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bdun bsams te //
T02D2932:339a-23: rang nyid gtum po'i skur gsal bas //
T02D2932:339a-24: rtsa ba'i sngags ni brjod par bya //
T02D2932:339a-25: aom na mo ratna ta y'a ya /
T02D2932:339a-26: na mashtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
T02D2932:339a-27: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye h'um h'um /
T02D2932:339a-28: phyogs skyong dag la gtor ma dag / rdo rje glu dang bcas pas dbul //
T02D2932:339a-29: sdig pa che dang bcas pa'i ma rungs pa //
T02D2932:339a-30: sa bdag dag la bka' bsgo bskrad byas nas //
T02D2932:339a-31: gzung ba sbyang zhing mandal legs byas te //
T02D2932:339a-32: sa yi lha mo dag la rab tu mchod //
T02D2932:339a-33: gser dngul la sogs bum par ni //
T02D2932:339a-34: bkra shis brgyad dang snying po sogs //
T02D2932:339a-35: gzhan rnams dri zhim chus dgang ba'o //
T02D2932:339a-36: phyogs bzhi dkar dang mthing dang dmar //
T02D2932:339a-37: ljang gu gtsang gos gdu bu'o //
T02D2932:339a-38: cod pan phur bu bcu rnams dang //
T02D2932:339a-39: gtor ma mchod rdzas bkra shis rdzas //
T02D2932:339a-40: yo byad rdzas rnams tshogs pa dang //
T02D2932:339a-41: thig dang tshon gyi las byas te //
T02D2932:339a-42: brtan pa'i sngags kyis thig byin brlabs //
T02D2932:339a-43: thig gi bya ba rdzogs pa yis //
T02D2932:339a-44: bsrung ba'i sngags tshon byin gyis brlab //
T02D2932:339a-46: sgo bzhi rta babs bcas pa bri //
T02D2932:339a-47: bum pa padma dag la dgod //
T02D2932:339a-48: phur pa 'khor lo rtsibs bcu la'o //
T02D2932:339b-0: lha snam dag la @339b gtor ma ste //
T02D2932:339b-1: 'dod yon bkra shis rdzas dag dgod //
T02D2932:339b-2: gru chad mchod pa rdzogs par bshams //
T02D2932:339b-3: de ltar rdzas rnams dgod par bya //
T02D2932:339b-4: rgyan rnams kun gyis legs bgos te //
T02D2932:339b-5: ku sha'i steng 'dug shar du blta //
T02D2932:339b-6: mchod cing sdig bshags sogs byas nas //
T02D2932:339b-7: tshad med bzhi ldan sems bskyed do //
T02D2932:339b-8: aom dharma dh'a tu sarba dharma aa:h'um gi sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02D2932:339b-9: gur dang dra ba'i rnam par bsgom //
T02D2932:339b-10: chos 'byung dkar po'i nang du bh'um //
T02D2932:339b-11: rin chen khang par mdzes par bskyed //
T02D2932:339b-12: dbus su pad steng bum pa'i nang //
T02D2932:339b-13: zla steng h'um byung rdo rje'i sku //
T02D2932:339b-14: mdog dkar rdo rje dril bu can //
T02D2932:339b-15: thugs kar zla steng rdo rje h'um //
T02D2932:339b-16: shar du pang steng bum pa'i nang //
T02D2932:339b-17: zla steng dh'i: 'byung sangs rgyas spyan //
T02D2932:339b-18: mdog dkar bum pa rdo rjes mtshan //
T02D2932:339b-19: thugs kar zla steng dh'i: yig bsam //
T02D2932:339b-20: lho ru pad steng bum pa'i nang //
T02D2932:339b-21: tr'am byung zla steng m'a ma k'i //
T02D2932:339b-22: mdog mthing bum pa rin chen nang //
T02D2932:339b-23: thugs kar zla steng sna tshogs tr'am//
T02D2932:339b-24: nub tu pad steng bum pa'i nang //
T02D2932:339b-25: zla steng ram byung gos dkar mo //
T02D2932:339b-26: mdog dkar bum pa padmas mtshan //
T02D2932:339b-27: thugs kar zla steng ram yig bsam //
T02D2932:339b-28: byang du pad steng bum pa'i nang //
T02D2932:339b-29: zla steng t'am byung sgrol ma'i sku //
T02D2932:339b-30: mdog ljang bum pa sna tshogs mtshan //
T02D2932:339b-31: thugs kar zla steng t'a bsam mo //
T02D2932:339b-32: rdo rje skyil krung gtso bo ste //
T02D2932:339b-33: rgyan rnams kyis ni rab brgyan te /
T02D2932:339b-34: mchod dang mchod pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2932:339b-35: yum rnams rnam par bzhengs pa'o //
T02D2932:339b-36: 'khor lo dag la nyi ma bcu //
T02D2932:339b-37: h'um gi sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02D2932:339b-38: rnam rgyal dkar po rdo rje bsnams //
T02D2932:339b-39: gshin rje dmar nag be con te //
T02D2932:339b-40: rta mgrin dmar po padmas mtshan //
T02D2932:339b-42: dbyug pa sngon po sngon po ste //
T02D2932:339b-43: don yod zhags pa mthing ga'o //
T02D2932:339b-44: khro gnyer can ni dmar nag ste //
T02D2932:339b-46: steng phyogs mthing ga chen po ste //
T02D2932:339b-47: 'og ni nam mkha'i mdog can no //
T02D2932:339b-48: phyag na phur bu so so ste //
T02D2932:339b-49: stag dang sbrul dang me dpung nang //
T02D2932:339b-50: de ltar dkyil 'khor rab rdzogs nas //
T02D2932:339b-51: ye shes spyan drangs mchod nas bstim //
T02D2932:339b-52: sku gsung thugs byin brlab pa ni //
T02D2932:339b-54: de nas dbang bskur zhing bsgom mo //
T02D2932:339b-56: aom sarbba bi dy'a badzra badzra h'um h'um /
T02D2932:340a-4: h'um dh'i:tr'am r'am t'am zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2932:340a-5: lan dang lan gyi tshul du mchod //
T02D2932:340a-6: de nas las kyi sgrub pa ni //
T02D2932:340a-7: aom na mo ratna ta y'a ya /
T02D2932:340a-8: na mashtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
T02D2932:340a-9: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
T02D2932:340a-12: tro ta ya tro ta ya /
T02D2932:340a-14: spho ta ya spho ta ya /
T02D2932:340a-15: gh'urnna ghurnna ghurnna pa ya ghurnna pa ya /
T02D2932:340a-25: sam ku ta ya sam ku ta ya /
T02D2932:340a-28: sam gha ta ya sam gha ta ya /
T02D2932:340a-29: aatta ha sa n'i la badzra su badzra ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2932:340a-30: h'um dh'i:tr'am r'am t'am h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2932:340a-31: spro dang bsdu bas gtso bo zhu //
T02D2932:340a-32: gtso bos 'khor dang de bzhin no //
T02D2932:340a-33: gtso bo'i bdud rtsi chu nang nas //
T02D2932:340a-34: rnam shes shar du nyi steng h'um //
T02D2932:340a-35: bdag nyid gtum por bsam byas nas //
T02D2932:340a-36: sku gsung skye mched byin brlab bya //
T02D2932:340a-39: pra tisthi ra badzra a'a:gung mo thal sbyar rdo rje ste //
T02D2932:340a-41: mdzub mo rtse sbyar padma yis //
T02D2932:340a-42: lan gsum bcings nas gsang sngags gsum //
T02D2932:340a-43: zla steng rdo rje 'khor lo ste //
T02D2932:340a-45: skye mched zla steng rdo rje ni //
T02D2932:340a-46: so so dag la bsam par bya'o //
T02D2932:340a-48: aa pra ti ha ta badzra /
T02D2932:340a-52: de nas phyogs skyong bcu rnams dgug / khro bo bcu yi phur bus gdab //
T02D2932:340a-53: he phu lu ni ru phu lu grihna ku lu
T02D2932:340a-54: mi li tsu lu ku ru ku lu badzra k'i
T02D2932:340a-59: mo ta na pra mo ta na ye k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2932:340a-63: m'a ra ya k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2932:340a-65: tsu ru tsu ru ma h'a kro dha tsanda k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2932:340a-68: ma h'a k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2932:340a-69: bandha bandha krodha krodha k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2932:340a-70: ha ra ha ra badzra dha r'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2932:340a-71: pra ha ra pra ha ra badzra pra bhanydza n'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2932:340a-72: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2932:340a-73: brgya'am nyi shu rtsa gcig gis //
T02D2932:340a-74: go rims bzhin du phyogs rnams bcing //
T02D2932:340a-75: slob dpon chos gos yongs gyon nas //
T02D2932:340a-76: rdo rje dril bu rab thogs nas //
T02D2932:340a-77: gzhan dag mchod rdzas thogs byas te //
T02D2932:340a-78: kha zas dri zhim sman dang ni //
T02D2932:340b-0: bkra shis rdzas thogs slob ma dag / bskor @340b zhing glu 'di blang bar bya'o //
T02D2932:340b-2: sarba ba le a'a brta ya /
T02D2932:340b-3: ma h'a ba le ka ta be /
T02D2932:340b-6: manda la m'a ye aa ti badzra /
T02D2932:340b-7: ma h'a ba le be ga ra na ra na aa dzi te dzva la dzva la /
T02D2932:340b-8: ti ti ti ti ping+ga le /
T02D2932:340b-12: bandha bandha ma h'a ba le /
T02D2932:340b-13: badzra kro dha dzva l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2932:340b-14: zhes pas blang zhing bskor bar bya'o //
T02D2932:340b-15: grub pa chud mi za bar bya //
T02D2932:340b-16: bkra shis ston mo bza' bar bya //
T02D2932:340b-17: slob ma'i 'dod pa sgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D2932:340b-18: gtsang gos ser po rgyan btags nas //
T02D2932:340b-19: ku sha'i steng du legs 'dug ste //
T02D2932:340b-20: 'khor lo'i steng du gzhag par bya //
T02D2932:340b-21: gang dag yid dge sems dang ba'i//
T02D2932:340b-22: sdig bshags sems bskyed sdom pa sbyin //
T02D2932:340b-23: spyi bor gtso bo mgrin par bdag / thugs kar yum ni bsam par bya //
T02D2932:340b-24: sangs rgyas bstims nas khrus gsol bya //
T02D2932:340b-25: bdag nyid khro bo'i thugs ka nas //
T02D2932:340b-26: lha mo'i glu dang bcas pas bkru //
T02D2932:340b-27: spyi bor bdag po bsam par bya //
T02D2932:340b-28: brtan par bya phyir sngags 'di bzlas //
T02D2932:340b-32: badzra k'a ya a'a brta ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2932:340b-33: mchod pa dag gis yang dag mchod //
T02D2932:340b-34: deng nas bzung ste lha yi sku //
T02D2932:340b-35: rtag tu bral bar mi bya'o //
T02D2932:340b-36: lus kyi las dag bya ba ni //
T02D2932:340b-37: mi dge bcu dag mi bya'o //
T02D2932:340b-38: de ltar rdzogs nas gtor ma gang //
T02D2932:340b-39: sbyang spel sbyar ba byas nas ni //
T02D2932:340b-40: dkyil 'khor lha dang mgron rnams mchod //
T02D2932:340b-41: aom na ma:sa manta badzr'a n'am /
T02D2932:340b-42: sarba ba le a'a brta ya /
T02D2932:340b-49: aa ti badzra ma h'a ba le be ga ra
T02D2932:340b-50: na ra na aa dzi te dzva la dzva la
T02D2932:340b-51: / ti ti ti ti pingga le /
T02D2932:340b-52: da ha da ha te dzo ba ti /
T02D2932:340b-56: badzra kro dha dzva la ye sv'ah'a /
T02D2932:340b-57: bar du gcod pa sel ba'i khro bo bcu mchod pa'o //
T02D2932:340b-58: ha ra har badzr'a dha r'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2932:340b-60: pra ha ra pra ha ra badzra pra bhanydza n'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2932:340b-61: aom aa k'a ro mu kham zhes bya bas 'byung po thams cad pa'i mchod pa'o //
T02D2932:340b-62: de ltar mchod nas bstod pa ni /
T02D2932:340b-63: bde gshegs dri med khro bo'i sku //
T02D2932:340b-64: skyon gyis ma gos sku mdog dkar //
T02D2932:340b-65: rdo rje dril bu mi g-yo brten //
T02D2932:340b-67: dus gsum sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i yum //
T02D2932:340b-68: skyon gyis ma gos sku mdog dkar //
T02D2932:341a-0: sems can bde la sbyar mdzad @341a * //
T02D2932:341a-2: spel ba'i rdo rje ma la bstod //
T02D2932:341a-3: yon tan thams cad bskyed pa'i yum //
T02D2932:341a-4: mi 'gyur rin chen bee d'ur mdog / sems can kun gyi skyabs mdzad pa'i //
T02D2932:341a-5: sku yi rdo rje ma la bstod //
T02D2932:341a-6: dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba'i //
T02D2932:341a-7: 'dod chags dri ma spangs pa'i yum //
T02D2932:341a-8: sems can rnams la spro ba mdzad //
T02D2932:341a-9: blo ldan rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2932:341a-10: bya ba thams cad yongs su bsgrub //
T02D2932:341a-11: shes rab sgrol ma yum gyi mchog / ljang gu'i mdog can 'gying bag can //
T02D2932:341a-12: don dang ldan la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2932:341a-13: khro bo chen po brjid pa'i sku //
T02D2932:341a-14: zhe sdang rnam dag bdag nyid can //
T02D2932:341a-15: dri za 'dul mdzad rdo rje bsnams //
T02D2932:341a-16: rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2932:341a-17: khro bo chen po brjid pa'i sku //
T02D2932:341a-18: nga rgyal rnam dag bdag nyid can //
T02D2932:341a-19: gshin rje 'joms byed be con bsnams //
T02D2932:341a-20: gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2932:341a-21: khro bo chen po brjid pa'i sku //
T02D2932:341a-22: 'dod chags rnam dag bdag nyid can //
T02D2932:341a-24: rta mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2932:341a-25: khro bo chen po brjid pa'i sku //
T02D2932:341a-26: phrag dog rnam dag bdag nyid can //
T02D2932:341a-29: me dpung 'bar pa brjid pa'i sku //
T02D2932:341a-30: sngon po'i mdog can dbyug pa sngo //
T02D2932:341a-31: me lha gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i //
T02D2932:341a-32: dbyug sngon can la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2932:341a-33: me dpung 'bar ba brjid pa'i sku //
T02D2932:341a-34: don yod zhags pa mthing ga'i mdog / rlung lha gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i //
T02D2932:341a-35: don yod zhags la phyag 'chal bstod //
T02D2932:341a-36: me dpung 'bar ba brjid pa'i sku //
T02D2932:341a-37: khro gnyer can ni dmar nag ste //
T02D2932:341a-38: srin po'i gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i //
T02D2932:341a-39: khro gnyer can la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2932:341a-40: me dpung 'bar ba brjid pa'i sku //
T02D2932:341a-41: rdo rje 'khor lo ljang gu'i mdog /'byung po'i dregs
T02D2932:341a-42: pa 'joms mdzad pa'i rdo rje 'khor lo phyag 'tshal
T02D2932:341a-43: bstod // rdo rje h'um sgra sgrogs pa che //
T02D2932:341a-44: steng phyogs dregs pa 'joms mdzad pa'i //
T02D2932:341a-45: mthing ga'i mdog can rab 'jigs pa //
T02D2932:341a-46: h'um sgra sgrogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2932:341a-47: stobs chen rab tu gnon mdzad pa'i //
T02D2932:341b-0: 'og gi bgegs chen gnon pa'i bdag / nam @341b mkha'i mdog can 'jigs pa'i sku //
T02D2932:341b-1: stobs chen gnon la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2932:341b-2: de ltar bstod nas gshegs su gsol //
T02D2932:341b-3: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa ste dang po las kyi rim pa'o /
T02D2932:341b-5: // / thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa ni //
T02D2932:341b-6: bdag nyid lha yi skur bsgoms la //
T02D2932:341b-7: mandal me tog bcas pa'i steng //
T02D2932:341b-8: gtso bo'i bum pa steng bzhag ste //
T02D2932:341b-9: yang snying nye ba'i snying po bzlas //
T02D2932:341b-10: snying po them nas bsgrub pa brtsam //
T02D2932:341b-11: dang pos yi cho ga bya //
T02D2932:341b-12: mandal mda' gang gru bzhi ste //
T02D2932:341b-14: so sor rigs dang mthun par bri //
T02D2932:341b-15: gser dngul la sogs bum par ni //
T02D2932:341b-16: nor bu yungs kar 'dur ba dang //
T02D2932:341b-18: gser dang rin chen chus dgang bya //
T02D2932:341b-19: dri zhim bkang ba'i bum pa bzhi //
T02D2932:341b-20: 'dab ma bzhi por gzhag par bya //
T02D2932:341b-21: 'khor lo'o steng du de bzhin te //
T02D2932:341b-22: mchod pa'i rdzas dang gtor ma bshams //
T02D2932:341b-23: de ltar rdzogs nas kun sha'i steng //
T02D2932:341b-24: rgyan dang bcas pas legs 'dug ste //
T02D2932:341b-25: mchod cing sdig bshags la sogs bya //
T02D2932:341b-26: aom sarba dharma dh'a tu a'a:de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin las //
T02D2932:341b-27: yi ge h'um du rab bsams te //
T02D2932:341b-28: rdo rje'i khang pa rab tu bskyed //
T02D2932:341b-29: bh'um las rin chen khang par ni //
T02D2932:341b-30: dag cing gsal ba rgyan dang bcas //
T02D2932:341b-31: pam las byung ba'i padma'i gdan //
T02D2932:341b-32: steng du rin chen bum pa ni //
T02D2932:341b-33: zla steng rdo rje mtshan pa'o //
T02D2932:341b-38: yang snying zla steng h'um la ste /
T02D2932:341b-39: snying po zla steng rdo rje la'o //
T02D2932:341b-46: dha r'a ya dha r'a ya badzra /
T02D2932:341b-47: d'a ru na d'a ru na badzra /
T02D2932:341b-50: gtso bo'i bum pa de bzhin du //
T02D2932:341b-51: phyogs bzhi'i bum pa'i rdo rje la //
T02D2932:341b-52: yang snying bzhi po go rims bzhin //
T02D2932:341b-53: de bzhin khro bo'i bum pa la //
T02D2932:341b-54: nyi ma khro bo'i rdo rje la //
T02D2932:341b-55: snying po'i sngags kyis so so ste //
T02D2932:341b-56: go rims bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2932:341b-57: de ltar rdzogs nas sangs rgyas bstim //
T02D2932:341b-58: bdag nyid shar du gnas pa yis //
T02D2932:341b-59: mchod dang mchod pa'i tshul du bzlas //
T02D2932:342a-2: na ma:tsanda badzra p'a na ye /
T02D2932:342a-3: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
T02D2932:342a-9: aatta ha sa n'i la badzra su badzr'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2932:342a-11: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02D2932:342a-12: na ma shtsanda badzra b'a na ye /
T02D2932:342a-13: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
T02D2932:342a-19: dhe r'a ya dha r'a badzra /
T02D2932:342a-20: dha r'a ya dha r'a ya badzra //
T02D2932:342a-21: d'a ru na d'a ru na badzra /
T02D2932:342a-23: bhinda bhinda badzra aa mri te h'um h'um phat /
T02D2932:342a-24: de ni gtso bo'i bzlas pa ste //
T02D2932:342a-25: yang snying mchod pa'i bum pa la'o //
T02D2932:342a-26: snying pos bar chad sel ba'i phyir //
T02D2932:342a-27: phyogs skyong bcu po bsdu par bya'o //
T02D2932:342a-28: de ltar byas na bdag nyid dang //
T02D2932:342a-29: slob mas bsgo ba bkra shis rdzas //
T02D2932:342a-30: mchod rdzas thogs nas bskor ba dang //
T02D2932:342a-31: bstod pa'i sngags ni brjod pa dang //
T02D2932:342a-32: de nas bkra shis ston mo bya //
T02D2932:342a-33: bdag gis da ni khrus bya ste //
T02D2932:342a-34: lha mo dpag med sprul nas ni //
T02D2932:342a-35: slob ma dag la khrus gsol phyir //
T02D2932:342a-36: gsang sngags bstod pas khrus gsol bya'o //
T02D2932:342a-38: sarba ba le a'a brta ya /
T02D2932:342a-39: ma h'a ba le ka ta be ta ta le /
T02D2932:342a-44: be ga ra na ra na aa dzi ti dzva la dzva la /
T02D2932:342a-45: ti ti ti ti pingga le /
T02D2932:342a-49: bandha bandha ma h'a ba le badzra kro dha dzva l'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2932:342a-54: aa pra ti ha ta badzra /
T02D2932:342a-61: sarba badzra ku lam a'a brta ye sv'ah'a /
T02D2932:342a-63: gtor ma phul te gshegs su gsol //
T02D2932:342a-64: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'o /
T02D2932:342a-66: // / gsung gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa ni //
T02D2932:342a-67: bdag nyid khro bo'i skur bsgoms nas //
T02D2932:342a-68: mandal steng du gtso bo'i bum //
T02D2932:342a-69: sa bon la brten bsnyen pa bya //
T02D2932:342a-70: dang po sa yi cho ga bya //
T02D2932:342a-71: mandal shin tu legs byas te //
T02D2932:342a-73: de de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas ni //
T02D2932:342a-74: rin chen rgyu las byas pa yi //
T02D2932:342a-75: bum pa lnga po pad steng dgram //
T02D2932:342a-76: las kyi bum pa shar du ste //
T02D2932:342a-77: gtso bo'i snying po rdzas kyis dgang //
T02D2932:342a-78: gzhan dag dri zhim chus dgang ngo //
T02D2932:342a-79: mchod dang gtor ma zhal zas bsham //
T02D2932:342a-80: ku sha'i steng du legs 'dug ste //
T02D2932:342b-0: byang chub @342b mchog tu sems bskyed do //
T02D2932:342b-1: de nas stong ba'i ting 'dzin las //
T02D2932:342b-2: bdag nyid khro bo'i skur bskyed nas //
T02D2932:342b-3: spyan drangs byin rlabs rdzogs pa yis //
T02D2932:342b-4: mdun du mandal rin chen gnas //
T02D2932:342b-6: steng du bum pa lnga bskyed nas //
T02D2932:342b-7: nang du zla steng sa bon ni //
T02D2932:342b-9: na mashtsa nda badzra krodh'a ya h'um /
T02D2932:342b-15: bum pa ba zhil so sor ste //
T02D2932:342b-16: de ltar bskyed nas sangs rgyas bstim //
T02D2932:342b-17: bsgrub pa'i rig sngags 'di bzlas so //
T02D2932:342b-18: na mashtsanda badzra kro dh'a ya /
T02D2932:342b-24: mchod dang mchod pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2932:342b-25: bdud rtsi chu yi rang bzhin bsam //
T02D2932:342b-26: las kyi bum pa byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2932:342b-27: bum nang zla steng bdud rtsi 'khyil //
T02D2932:342b-28: sngon po brang du bsnol ba'i phyag / shin tu 'jigs pa bskyed par bya //
T02D2932:342b-29: aom na ma:tsanda badzra kro dha ya /
T02D2932:342b-34: aa mri ta kunda li h'um phat /
T02D2932:342b-35: ces pas bgegs bskrad bskor bar bya //
T02D2932:342b-36: bkra shis gsol nas khrus bya'o //
T02D2932:342b-37: gtor ma'i cho ga rdzogs pa yis //
T02D2932:342b-38: dam tshig bsdus nas gshegs su gsol //
T02D2932:342b-39: rig pa'i las dag gtang ba'i phyir //
T02D2932:342b-40: gang dag yid dge sems dang pas //
T02D2932:342b-42: lus ni byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2932:342b-47: aa pra ti ha ra badzra /
T02D2932:342b-53: 'dug ste phreng ba dor bar bya'o //
T02D2932:342b-57: h'um p'u dza ho zhes bya bas dor bar bya'o //
T02D2932:342b-58: de nas rdo rje phyag byed du bcug la /
T02D2932:342b-59: rdo rje'i glu dang bcas pas bskor bar bya ste /
T02D2932:342b-60: gong du yang de bzhin no //
T02D2932:342b-61: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa kye //
T02D2932:342b-62: gtso bo 'khor bcas dgongs su gsol //
T02D2932:342b-63: mi shes mun gyis bsgribs pa la //
T02D2932:342b-64: dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan du gsal //
T02D2932:342b-65: lam chen 'di ni bstan par bya //
T02D2932:342b-66: khyod ni lam nyid sgrub par gyis //
T02D2932:342b-67: lam mchog sgrub par rab tu dka' //
T02D2932:342b-68: nyes pa dag gis ma gos par //
T02D2932:342b-70: dam tshig 'das na dmyal bar ltung //
T02D2932:342b-71: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02D2932:343a-0: na ma:tsanda badzra kro dha ya na ra @343a * //
T02D2932:343a-2: mi shes mun gyis bsgribs pa la //
T02D2932:343a-5: bkra shis rdzas kyis mchod par bya //
T02D2932:343a-6: de nas lha mos khrus gsol nas //
T02D2932:343a-7: 'khor lo'i steng du bzhag nas ni //
T02D2932:343a-8: slob ma lha yi skur bskyed la //
T02D2932:343a-9: mchod pa dag gis yang dag mchod //
T02D2932:343a-10: dus gsum gshegs pa'i sku yi mchog / sku dang yongs su rgyas pa'i sku //
T02D2932:343a-11: sku mchog 'di ni khyod kyis zung //
T02D2932:343a-12: lus kyi mi dge spang bar bya'o //
T02D2932:343a-13: sarba ta th'a ga ta su ti sthir badzra aom //
T02D2932:343a-14: de nas mchod pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2932:343a-15: dus gsum gshegs pa thugs kyi mchog / thugs dang phrin las ldan pa'i thugs //
T02D2932:343a-16: ye shes 'di ni khyod kyis zung //
T02D2932:343a-17: yid kyi las dag mi bya'o //
T02D2932:343a-18: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ti sthi ra badzra h'um /
T02D2932:343a-19: mi 'bral gzungs kyi bdag nyid che //
T02D2932:343a-20: mu tig rin chen phreng ba 'di //
T02D2932:343a-21: sku dang ye shes mi 'bral ba'i //
T02D2932:343a-22: ngag gi nyes spong phreng ba gzung //
T02D2932:343a-23: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta pra ti sthi ra
T02D2932:343a-24: badzra a'a: de nas bkra shis brgyad dang rgyal mtshan
T02D2932:343a-25: dang / gdugs kyis kyang dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2932:343a-27: tshigs su bcad pa 'di lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D2932:343a-28: yon tan rgyas pa sku mdog gser dang mtshungs //
T02D2932:343a-29: shes rab rtags su pu sti ral gri bsnams //
T02D2932:343a-30: 'phags pa 'jam dpal bkra shis gang yin pa //
T02D2932:343a-31: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs
T02D2932:343a-32: shog / thugs rje'i rtags su sku mdog zla ba'i
T02D2932:343a-33: 'od // ma chags skyon gyis ma gos phyag na padma bsnams //
T02D2932:343a-34: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi bkra shis gang yin pa //
T02D2932:343a-35: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs
T02D2932:343a-36: shog / chos nyid mi 'gyur rtags su sku mdog
T02D2932:343a-37: mthing nag ste // thabs dang shes rab dbyer med rtags su rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2932:343a-38: dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
T02D2932:343a-39: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs
T02D2932:343a-40: shog / de nas gtor ma btang nas ye shes
T02D2932:343a-41: sems dpa'i mdun du yi ge brgya pa brjod de
T02D2932:343a-42: gshegs su gsol / dad pas bla ma bzang btsal des //
T02D2932:343a-43: dam pa'i drin gyis yang dag thob //
T02D2932:343a-44: dge ba gang gis ye shes 'di //
T02D2932:343a-45: 'dir bzhugs rnams kyis thob par shog / rdo rje
T02D2932:343b-0: rnam par @343b 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
T02D2932:343b-1: rin chen snang ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen
T02D2932:343b-2: po sa wa ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2932:343b-4: // / bal po'i bla ma de ba purna ma ti dang /
